description.displayText:
Tessa genuinely has a passion for caring for children. She is so patient and gentle with my rambunctious 7 year old! 

Tessa has been providing child care for our family for a year and a half. She is punctual and
communicative. My child looks forward to it when I tell her that Tessa will be babysitting her. 

As a single parent, it brings me so much peace of mind knowing that my child is in capable and loving hands as I navigate our busy schedules. I have had several instances where I have been able to ask Tessa for assistance on rather short notice to pick my child up from her after school program when I was pushing hard on a work deadline. 

Tessa has become a family member, and her expertise is invaluable for any family lucky enough to be able to book her.

description.displayText: Tessa is amazing! She is the best sitter that I've ever hired. Her punctuality, professionalism, and love shown to my child is unmatched. Tessa picks  my son up from school and travels with him to the public library to support him with homework. She communicates effectively and has never made me feel uncomfortable with caring for my son. I would recommend her to anyone looking for childcare.
